messages.title: The Liberal Democrats are fighting the hard Brexit
messages.content: The Liberal Democrats are determined to fight to keep Britain in the single market. With a Conservative victory likely, the more Lib Dem MPs in Parliament the better chance there is of challenging hard Brexit. A Lib Dem win in areas like ours can stop Theresa May getting the big majority she wants - and prevent her hard Brexit plans.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats are determined to fight to keep Britain in the single market and prevent hard Brexit plans.

mentions.tacticalSituation: A Lib Dem win in areas like ours can stop Theresa May getting the big majority she wants - and prevent her hard Brexit plans.

issues.brexitEurope:
The Liberal Democrats are determined to fight to keep Britain in the single market.
This is the end direction for Britain.

contactInformation.address: Liberal Democrats, 8-10 Great George Street, London, SW1P 3AE

quotes.text: Theresa May says she will take UK into the hardest of Brexits.
Only the Lib Dems can stop a hard Brexit.
I can hardly believe that the PM is now using the phrases and words that I have been mocked for using for years.
